content.rendered:
[et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Journey of Indo Farm

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Indo Farm Commencement” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/overview.jpg” badge_text=”2000″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Commencement of tractor production in Baddi, Himachal Pradesh with technical collaboration from Ursus, Poland.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”First Tractor Launch” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/2001.jpg” badge_text=”2001″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launched Indo farm‘s first tractor model 2050 DI.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Launched 3-series tractors” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/3065-1.jpg” badge_text=”2005″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launched 3-series tractor range 3065DI, 3050DI, 3040DI and 3035DI

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Poland Exports” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/genset.png” badge_text=”2006″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Began exporting engine parts to Ursus, Poland.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Started Production” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/overview.jpg” badge_text=”2007″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Commenced production of our own Foundry division.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Generator Engine to UK” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/genset.png” badge_text=”2008″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Exported generator engines to UK company, Lister Pitter. Accredited with an ISO 9001:2008 certified Company.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Indo Farm Green Gensets” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/overview.jpg” badge_text=”2009″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Commencement of production of Indo Power Green Gensets

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Harvester Production” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/COMBINE-AGRICOM-1070-SW.png” badge_text=”2010″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Started Production of harvester combines and also launched 75HP and 90 HP tractors

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Crane 16FN Production” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/indo-power-15fn-15fnt-crane.jpg” badge_text=”2011″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Initiated production of new generation crane model 16FN

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Indo Power Launch” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/b1fd586fc4e0aaa90dca3f067f224817.png” badge_text=”2014″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launched Indo Power Pick and Carry cranes with the capacity of 18 tons and 23 tons.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”New Tractors Production” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/3065-1.jpg” badge_text=”2015″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Initiated production of 26 HP 4×4 orchard tractors

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Barota Finance” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/1661169928564.jpg” badge_text=”2017″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launched our own subsidiary, Barota Finance Limited NBFC, for providing hassle-free and quick finance to our esteemed customers.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Indo Power Crane Launch” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/indo-power-15fn-15fnt-crane.jpg” badge_text=”2019″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launched Indo power 30 FN crane.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”New Tractor Launch” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/3065-1.jpg” badge_text=”2020″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launch of Indo farm 20HP and 100HP tractor.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Exploring European Markets” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/3065-1.jpg” badge_text=”2021″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launched 1026e tractor model for European market.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”More Tractor Launch” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/3065-1.jpg” badge_text=”2022″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launch of Indo 3055 DI HT and 3060.DI HT tractor.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][dsm_card_carousel_child title=”Product Launch” image=”https://www.indofarm.in/wp-content/uploads/2023/09/3065-1.jpg” badge_text=”2023″ button_url_new_window=”1″ _builder_version=”4.17.3″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Launch of Indo farm 3055 NV PLUS, 3065DI, 3075DI IN BS-IV and Indo Power pick and carry cranes of FN series (15, 18, 20, 23 and 30 tonne capacity in 2-wheel drive and 4 wheel drive variants) in BS-IV.

[/dsm_card_carousel_child][/dsm_card_carousel][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section]

excerpt.rendered:

Indo Farm Commencement

Commencement of tractor production in Baddi, Himachal Pradesh with technical collaboration from Ursus, Poland.

First Tractor Launch

Launched Indo farm‘s first tractor model 2050 DI.

Launched 3-series tractors

Launched 3-series […]
